rules_text:
Flash
When this creature enters, choose up to one other target permanent you control or permanent card in your graveyard that was put there from the battlefield this turn. Return it to your hand. If a legendary card was returned this way, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.
notes: 2.2.0: Ability got moved to Ouroboros stone, now is a kor skyfisher to bounce or bring back stuff that died.
